name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Today, a spokesperson for the Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs admitted that an unmanned airship from China had entered the skies over Latin America and the Caribbean. 
He said that the airship had seriously deviated from the planned route and mistakenly entered the relevant area. The relevant parties had been notified and the matter had been properly handled.

content:
Netizen contribution
Recently, the League of Legends Taiwan service area has become popular on various domestic platforms, because of the super good benefits and low-priced skins, etc., which attracted and attracted many domestic players.
After entering the Taiwan server, some domestic players created some very provocative game IDs, which attracted a lot of applause in the comment area.
But there are still some interesting comments
